## Type of Change

Please mark the relevant option:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Dependency update
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## Checklist

Please review and check all applicable items:

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any debugging code or console.logs

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested edge cases
- [ ] Coverage hasn't decreased (check with `npm run test:coverage`)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions/classes
- [ ] API changes are documented in API_REFERENCE.md (if applicable)

### Security

- [ ] I have considered security implications
- [ ] No sensitive data is logged or exposed
- [ ] Input validation is implemented where necessary
- [ ] No SQL injection vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] No XSS vulnerabilities introduced

### Database Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] I have created a migration script
- [ ] Migration has been tested on a copy of production data
- [ ] Rollback procedure is documented
- [ ] Database indexes are updated if needed

### Breaking Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] I have documented all breaking changes
- [ ] Migration guide is provided
- [ ] Version number has been updated appropriately

Add any additional notes or context about the PR here.

## Reviewer Checklist

For reviewers:

- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] Tests are comprehensive
- [ ] Documentation is complete
- [ ] Security considerations addressed
- [ ] Performance impact considered
- [ ] Breaking changes clearly documented
